title: 17th SAARC Summit: President Rajapaksa meets regional leaders in Maldives
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pi​x by Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa concluded bilateral talks with his regional leaders this morning on the sidelines of the two day SAARC Summit which is been held in Maldives from 10 November….
